resources.string: Click the + button to get started.
Click the + button to add a variable.
You have unsaved changes. Discard changes?
Shortcut not found. You might have to re-add it to the home screen.
Failed to use image as icon.
Send crash reports to help improve the app
Select the directory into which to export your shortcuts.\n\nPlease note that custom icons can not be exported.
Select the file to import shortcuts from.\n\nPlease note that your current shortcuts might be overwritten.
That\'s right, this app is open-source
%1$s will execute once a connection to the internet is available.
Thank you for your ratings and reviews

Please note that changes to the name or icon are not automatically applied to shortcuts that are already added to the home screen. You will have to add them again for the changes to take effect. All other changes are automatically applied.
Accept any certificate (I know what I\'m doing)
Delete this category?\n\nAll shortcuts contained within will be deleted.
Variable keys may only contain underscores, digits and letters from the English alphabet.
Variable key must not be empty.
Another variable with this key already exists.

This button allows you to include placeholders for variables, i.e., dynamic values, into your shortcut.\n\nYou don\'t have any variables configured yet. You can do so by clicking the CREATE button below.
This button allows you to include placeholders for the values of other variables into this one.\n\nYou don\'t have any variables configured yet, however.
Please add at least two values.
Please add at least one selectable option.
The date format is not valid.
The time format is not valid.

No suitable shortcuts found.

To use this feature you need to have at least one shortcut that uses a variable that allows 'Share …'.

See the documentation in the variable section for more information.

Sorry, but sharing text files into shortcuts is not yet supported. It will probably be added sometime in the future.
You can, however, share text snippets already. See the documentation in the variable section for more information.

Thank you for your understanding.
Type or paste a cURL command below to create a new shortcut from it.
Show as app shortcut on launcher
This feature is not supported on your device.
Prevent changes to shortcuts and settings
The maximum must be greater than the minimum.
The step size must be a positive number.
Help me make this app better!
For people who know what they\'re doing
Extracts the status code of the HTTP response and stores it in a variable.
Extracts the value of a specific header from the HTTP response and stores it in a variable. If no such header is present this action does nothing.
Extracts the value of a specific cookie from the HTTP response and stores it in a variable. If no such cookie is present this action does nothing.
Extracts the body from the HTTP response, or part of it, and stores it in a variable. If the specified part is not present this action does nothing.
Use 0 to denote the start/end of the string. Use negative numbers to denote an offset from the end of the string.

Describe the path within the JSON response, separated by dots. E.g. "2.title" would mean that the response is to be interpreted as a JSON array, of which the 2nd element should be used, which is then interpreted as a JSON object that contains a "title" field, from which the value should be extracted.
Changes the value of a variable.
Maximum recursion depth reached. Shortcut will not be triggered.
You don\'t have any shortcuts yet.

Select the method to use for placing the shortcut. If you encounter problems with the \"Default\" method you may try the \"Legacy\" method instead. Please note that some features (e.g. changing shortcut name) are not available with the Legacy method.
Enter your password to unlock the app settings.
Enter a password to lock the app settings and prevent modification of your shortcuts.
Data Saver and/or Battery Saver modes are enabled on your device. If you encounter problems with shortcuts not working, please try disabling these.
Set the shortcut\'s URL and HTTP method
Basic authentication with username and password
Digest authentication with username and password
Click the + button to add a request header.
Click the + button to add a parameter.
